Came for the live music but left after trying to order drinks and the bartender said she’d throw me and my friends out simply for advocating for myself as she kept serving others even though I had been waiting nearly 10 mins. I politely pointed out to her she had skipped me several times and then she threatened to kick us out for that, so we made it easier and left. I’d recommend not allowing your bartenders to drink so they can be most efficient and respectful to patrons while maintaining order within the establishment. It was also nearly shoulder to shoulder deep with people. Dangerously crowded.

places.name: The Honky Tonk STL
places.address: 756 S 4th St, St. Louis, MO 63102, USA
reviews: Would give zero stars if possible. Wev site specifically said they were open from 3 to 10. Arrived at 4 and not a soul around. Went to another bar around the area. Honky Tonk never did open. Complete disappointment. Dont trust their website

I would not recommend this place.
It's not a customer friendly experience for our visit there, I would not tip that singer to sing your song, good luck if you go to this place.

Really cool bar .  You can tell from the crown molding it's an old building that has been restored .  It looks very nice .   Staff was all very nice .  Had a awesome band playing there as well that night .  We will definitely be back
Had such a good time here! I can't speak on the drinks since I don't drink but it was so fun!

Had the best night ever for my bachelorette trip. Went in on a Thursday and the owner was so friendly and nice. The live music was perfect. We got to dance and have fun. The atmosphere was perfect! Highly recommended!!

places.name: Chic's n Dix HonkyTonk & Saloon
places.address: 11754 MO-5, Sunrise Beach, MO 65079, USA
reviews: We were there doing the lessons for line dancing. We didn't participate, but thoroughly enjoyed watching. I had the smash burger, best I've ever had. Different kinds of beef in one. Very good. Clean, nice atmosphere. Enjoyed the visit with our waitress.
Food was good. It was during Bikefest so it wouldn't be fait to rate service. They do need to have a couple of designated bartenders. All working were making drinks.

Stopped in during the week for a quick drink and dinner. they had music on in the background, but it was not overbearing and obnoxious. The establishment was extremely clean and the employees were friendly. The bartender was helpful and made some suggestions. I opted for the pulled chicken and french fries. Food was great, tons of flavor, well seasoned and a good portion. I also had a couple mixed drinks. Definitely good bartenders
FUUUN place!!! Good bar food and service. Owner is a GEM who takes her customers seriously! Live bands on Fri and Sat nights. A BIG dance floor adds to the experience. A MUST SEE!

It was an overall great experience. All employees were polite and extremely helpful. Prices were not bad for a specialty location. The mix drinks were a little higher than I am used to. It is a great place to eat, drink and dance!

places.name: Nash Vegas
places.address: 929 E Broadway, Columbia, MO 65201, USA
reviews: The DJ at Nash Vegas was just indicted on 7 felony charges for domestic violence on January 9th, 2026. These charges follow a decade of domestic violence against women according to casenet and his background check. Do better for the safety of the women in this establishment.

Really fun country bar in downtown Columbia. I actually performed there with Michael Leatherman, a great artist from Nashville. Check out his music! His new single, How Close We Can Get, just dropped.

Cold Drinks. Hopping crowd. Great tunes. As busy as they were? Bartenders stay ahead of demand.
Will visit again. Best honkytonk around.
(Was kinda cool listening to this or that song, and seeing the original artists picture on the wall😎)
Karaoke night is super fun. One of the best genuine honkytonk bars in the area. Feels like I’m in Nashville when I step inside!
They had a live band, Chris Morano, while I was there. They were good. I enjoyed it.

places.name: Gene's Country Club
places.address: 8734 Indian Foot Lake Rd, Pevely, MO 63070, USA
reviews: A true one-of-a-kind live music experience.  Go early, bring some dinner, and bring some cash for the bar.  We saw Dale Watson here and it was one of the best shows I've ever been to.  It's a very intimate/homey sort of setting.  There's a little bit of room to dance and you're encouraged to do so.  It's a good little drive out of town though, so don't bring too much cash for the bar!

I don’t think they server food or at least I didn’t see any. But the atmosphere was amazing, the band was awesome, and I thoroughly enjoyed watching all the line dancers. Outside patio was great for taking breaks and I really enjoyed the ponds.

Gene’s country club was everything I needed in my life on that specific weekend. It was such a fun and awesome atmosphere to be in. Cheap buckets of beer were a plus. I will be back, but can’t say I will ever learn to dance like everyone else, unfortunately.

Love this so far. So many great two step and one step songs.

I dont usually love love live bands because im bad at dancing to it but can I really knock them for it! They really do put alot effort since they only operate once a week and it shows!

No food (only drinks) and cash only. Sorta limiting but overall love it! They got a good mix of line dance and partner dance. If you're from a utah, Arizona and Texas and visit here it's a great experience.

Great atmosphere! Music/bands were phenomenal and kept the hype going all night. We loved watching the crowd jump in and dance to the great music. Staff was kind, and cheerful. Everything very clean and well managed. We will definitely be back!!

places.name: Rusty Spur Saloon
places.address: 7245 E Main St, Scottsdale, AZ 85251, USA
places.description: Historic saloon offering live country music, peanut shells underfoot & a Tex-Mex & American menu.
reviews: What a sweet little gem of a saloon!! My first time in and it did not disappoint!!  Awesome atmosphere with the friendliest staff!! So nice to be greeted with a giant smile!! This place is BUSY but they handle it like rockstars!! You can put a dollar on the wall that's collected at the end of the year and donated to charity!! They also have live music everyday!! The food was good, too!! If you're in the neighborhood, I highly recommend this one!!
Great margaritas!! It's so fun to see all the history and staff has fun with clientele. Great souvenir options and the live music is a great touch!

I think this is a great place. I love the outside and how it looks and it’s just like it. Text you back but not in 30 kind of way because everything is definitely clean wink wink I just kidding. It’s pretty clean actually.

Another visit Dec 2023. It doesn’t change from the last time. Always a good time and you get exactly what you expect from a classic dive cowboy bar!it’s just a Great small box cowboy dive bar. The decor is memorable and funny, esp the “big butt chairs”! We were there on a Sunday and they had a cowboy singer strumming a guitar and a few folks got up to dance in the middle of the bar! Good beer and a fun place to wet your whistle!
VictorB

Cool hole in the war bar with live music located right in Old Town Scottsdale. Good priced drinks, and great atmosphere. No thrills at this bar, just an amazing time. It’s very small, so be ready to pack in, drink and sing until your heart is content.

places.name: Dierks Bentley's Whiskey Row
places.address: 4420 N Saddlebag Trail, Scottsdale, AZ 85251, USA
places.description: Hip hangout offering modern comfort food, self-serve beer contraptions, plus DJs & live music.
reviews: We held a holiday celebration for about 40 people for our commercial real estate networking group in December 2025 and it was a huge success.  Mike and his staff were amazing from the moment we walked in - making sure everything was perfect.  They were friendly and helpful and the attention to detail truly elevated the entire experience! If you are looking for a venue to hold a group gathering, I would highly recommend Whiskey Row.  You will not be disappointed!
Great spot! Service was awesome, waitresses were 🔥, drinks were delicious. We watched the Canello vs Crawford fight there and had a blast!

Went to the Broncos watch party and had SO MUCH fun!! Mike was awesome and took great care of us. It was PACKED and service was still phenomenal!!

Also fire DJ

Def coming back!

Came to hear the live music on NYE, but they were cut short !!! Great musicians Casey & Matt!! & Great service! The GM was very welcoming & asked our plans for the night. However, It’s hard to enjoy genuine performances if corporate cuts the music short :( overall glad to enjoy the live music & entertainment!
Mike, the manager, was great! He checked in on us multiple times to make sure we were happy with everything. The atmosphere was lively and friendly and we can’t wait to come back.

places.name: Handlebar J
places.address: 7116 E Becker Ln, Scottsdale, AZ 85254, USA
places.description: Cowboy hats hang from the ceiling of this steak & rib eatery playing live country music nightly.
reviews:
Big issue trying to get seated. They won't let a single diner sit in a 4 person table or higher. Just do it anyways.

RIBS were definitely top notch as was fries and biscuits.

Country cover band was playing and they were average. Good crowd for a $10 Friday night cover charge.
Had a well done burger and cole  slaw for$15
Great place for line dancing and cocktails.  Skip the food and enjoy a good time on the dance floor.  The food is mediocre at best.

Camille had roses and food ready for my wife's 1 year anniversary! She was amazing and took amazing care of us.  Great music great dancing and our favorite spot every time we come to Scottsdale!!  Thank you Camille

Fun! Great outdoor seating when the weather cooperates. Attentive bar staff. Good liquor selection. Ribs were tender and flavorful. Could use a few more food selections (maybe salmon?). The band wasn't overly loud, even with a dozen members. Close parking is a bit limited.

This place was a lot of fun! Line dancing lessons were a blast. The instructor was great and very helpful. I didn't step on any toes, so I call that a win. We had appetizers that were delicious. The chicken bites and jalapeño poppers hit the spot with a cold drink. The atmosphere of this restaurant is just downright fun!

places.name: Buffalo Chip Saloon and Steakhouse
places.address: 6823 E Cave Creek Rd, Cave Creek, AZ 85331, USA
places.description: A dance hall, saloon & mini-rodeo, this Western roadhouse also serves chops, fried fish & tacos.
reviews: Had a great time in the VIP area.  Lucky to have that spot because the rest of the place was so crowded.  We had all you can eat buffet and a private bar.  Service was great up there.  Rodeo was fun.  Bathroom situation needs improved.  One bathroom for hundreds of drinking patrons.  Lines were insane.  Otherwise we had a great time.

Rustic rodeo Western vibe which is cool if that is what you're looking for. Food was very average in our mid-afternoon experience.

They have a photo booth with their branding on it. Horrible quality, clearly something is wrong with it. We showed the photos to our waitress and asked for a refund of the $20 we spent. She acknowledged they've had problems with it but thought it was fixed. She went to talk to her manager and said there's nothing they will do.

So $20 wasted on photos that are absolutely useless.

Fun place, very rustic. VIP seats are expensive, and we were initially given a table with restricted views so we could only see half the arena. We had to move to the arena seats for the first part of the show to be able to see properly. We were then offered another table with a better view as a party did not show. Food was good BBQ buffet style, but got cold quickly. Would have been nice to have a sweet dessert like a bit of apple pie or a brownie to help justify the $65 charge.
They then over charged us by not deducting the full deposit we paid from the final bill. They did resolve this very quickly.

We went for the Wednesday night bull riding. The service from the doorman to the DJ was top notch. We received great parking information, easy no-hassle entry, personal attention while buying swag, clean restrooms, quick bar service in multiple areas, DJ mix range was impressive as it spanned country to hip hop, new music to classics, the ring announcer kept the crowd engaged and introduced each rider and bull.
What a really fun place to visit. Great country vibes and even a house band 5 nights a week. Food was decent and the service is fantastic. Definitely worth stopping by when in the area.

places.name: Roosters Country
places.address: 3731 E Main St, Mesa, AZ 85205, USA
places.description: Casual, red-hued venue offerings beers, cocktails, live country music, karaoke & pool tables.
reviews: I went here for my first time today and it happened to be the 11 year anniversary. I can see why this place has been around for so long because it was real nice and so were the people. Good music also. Will be sure to visit again!

Cherie and Steve run a fun bar with live music and Karaoke 🎤 😄
The bartender was very friendly too

Not a huge neighborhood bar guy, but as far as they go, this is as good as any and much better than most.  Crowd and staff were welcoming.  Good pours on drinks and a decent selection.  The 80s band playing was pretty decent too.  Definitely would be back if i lived in the area.  May still make the trip off and on.

So, we stopped in last night during karaoke. Sat down at the bar, waited a good 10mins, and never got service. The bartender was walking around behind the bar looking like she was trying to avoid us. So we got up and left. On our way out, a guy participating in the karaoke asked, "you're not staying?" And I told him, "ya I'm not sure what the problem is, but we can't order a drink," and he replied, "oh, I know what the problem is...it's been a problem all night actually, we can't get one either."

It was our very first time trying to visit, always wanted to stop in. But we won't try again: no point.

The grill food was "ok" at best. Service was decent. Maybe they were a lil understaffed. IDK. Atmosphere was comfy. The band was mediocre and karaoke, in The back, awful. As a smoker... I didn't even wanna be out there
